The fluid of _____’s tail secretions changes in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon’s emotions change.

The unique creations produced by each _____ are painted using the fluid that oozes from its tail. This is how it marks its territory.
_____ marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.
Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
A _____ marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.
